biotools.summary: LungDWM is used for lung cancer subtype diagnosis using weakly paired multiomics data. LungDWM leverages attention-based feature encoders to extract the shared and specific features of multiomics data, imputes missing omics data from available ones through generative adversarial learning and makes the subtype diagnosis by fusing real and imputed data.
